trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.AnchorChanged" /> and <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.CargoChanged" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para os eventos de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.AnchorChanged" /> e de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.CargoChanged" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventArgs> data includes the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> that raised the event, the anchor or cargo resource associated with the event, and the action that was taken - <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Added>, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Removed>, or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Modified>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventArgs> dados incluem o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> que gerado o recurso de evento, a âncora ou carga associado ao evento e a ação foi tomada - <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Added>, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Removed>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Modified>.

trans-unit.source: The annotation that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A anotação que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos" /> resource of the event.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventArgs.#ctor(System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation,System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction,System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource)" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventArgs.#ctor(System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation,System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction,System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource)" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="action" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="action" /> não é um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction" /> válido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the action of the annotation <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventArgs.Resource" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventHandler> is called when an <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> resource is <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Added>, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Removed>, or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Modified>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventHandler> é chamado quando um <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> recurso é <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Added>, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Removed>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Modified>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos" /> resource associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o recurso <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors" /> ou <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos" /> associado ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The annotation anchor or cargo resource that was <see cref="F:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Added" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Removed" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Modified" />.
trans-unit.target: O recurso de carga ou de âncora de anotação que foi <see cref="F:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Added" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Removed" />, ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Modified" />.
